title: I just reached level 3 but i didnt get Ashe and Garen
body:
So, i just reached level 3 and i didnt get 400rp so i thought i will get Garen and Ashe and Sanguine Garen/Sherwood Ashe. But i didnt. {{item:3070}} 
Even when i log in again, it does not appear. Please tell me what to do.( I am a new NA player )

replies.body:
You get the new player chest when you hit level 5, not level 3.  

I'm curious because we did recently change the reward you get and the level you get it at - why did you think it was at level 3?  Was this listed somewhere in our messaging or our site?

DON'T UNLOCK ASHE AND GAREN USING THE CHAMPION SHARDS AND CHAMPION ESSENCE IN THE FREE CHEST.

You can get Garen for free by subscribing to twitter and Ashe is a 450 IP champion that you can get from only a couple days' worth of IP. Champion unlocks through shards at the 450 IP tier give a very poor rate of saved IP per shard and essence spent and you are better off saving your essence to unlock an expensive 6300 champion and your shards to reroll into a randomly priced champion.

For skins it's fine to unlock them with the chest's contents as you would otherwise need to spend RP on them and random skin rerolls are way less likely to get a skin you want on a champion you want to play
